scripts.bundle: mkdir -p dist && browserify -r ./lib/ajv.js:ajv -o dist/ajv.bundle.js -s Ajv && uglifyjs dist/ajv.bundle.js -o dist/ajv.min.js -c pure_getters -m --source-map dist/ajv.min.js.map -r Ajv --preamble '/* Ajv JSON-schema validator */'
scripts.bundle-regenerator: mkdir -p dist && browserify -r ./node_modules/regenerator/main.js:regenerator -o dist/regenerator.bundle.js && uglifyjs dist/regenerator.bundle.js -o dist/regenerator.min.js -c -m --source-map dist/regenerator.min.js.map
scripts.bundle-nodent: mkdir -p dist && browserify -r ./node_modules/nodent/nodent.js:nodent -t brfs -o dist/nodent.bundle.js && uglifyjs dist/nodent.bundle.js -o dist/nodent.min.js -c -m --source-map dist/nodent.min.js.map
scripts.bundle-all: npm run bundle && npm run bundle-regenerator && npm run bundle-nodent
scripts.test-browser: npm run bundle-all && scripts/prepare-tests && karma start --single-run --browsers PhantomJS
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run eslint && npm run build && npm run test-cov && npm run test-browser
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run bundle-all
